attributes.action: Open an enquiry into the Yorkshore Police Forces jandling of the Hillsbourgh disaster and bring those found responsible/negligent to justice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The families of 96 people from the Liverpool area have never felt justice was served. The whole matter seems to have been swept under the carpet and forgotten about. It is high time that someone did something about this and with a new PM in position, maybe someone in his goverment would oblige.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
